mapper.select:
SELECT U.UNIVERSE_ID, U.MEMBER_ID, M.NICKNAME, U.TITLE, U.THUMBNAIL_URL, U.LIKE_COUNT, U.CREATE_DATE FROM TB_UNIVERSE U JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON U.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE U.STATUS = 'Y'
AND U.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND M.NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND U.MEMBER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND U.UNIVERSE_ID IN ( SELECT TH.UNIVERSE_ID FROM TB_TAG_HISTORY TH JOIN TB_TAG T ON TH.TAG_ID = T.TAG_ID WHERE T.TAG_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
AND ( U.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR M.NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
AND ( U.LIKE_COUNT < #{lastLikeCount} OR (U.LIKE_COUNT = #{lastLikeCount} AND U.UNIVERSE_ID < #{lastUniverseId}) )
AND U.UNIVERSE_ID < #{lastUniverseId}
ORDER BY U.LIKE_COUNT DESC, U.UNIVERSE_ID DESC
ORDER BY U.UNIVERSE_ID DESC
LIMIT #{limit}
